title: Welcome Home to Quality Living At An Affordable Price. 2 Bedroom!
posting_body: > Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!
If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.
Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.
The perfect two or three bedroom floorplan awaits you at Knolls at West Oaks.
Our homes feature open living areas connecting to a peaceful private patio.
The bedroom comes complete with a large walk-in closet and cozy carpeting.
The kitchen includes granite-looking countertops, full appliances, and an abundance of cabinet space.
Beside the kitchen, you will also find a laundry closet with hookups for a full-size washer and dryers.
- NEW On-Site Fitness Center with Equipment
- On-Site Renovation In Progress - Upgrades & Updates Coming Soon!
We are a pet friendly community!
*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.
Knolls at West Oaks participates in an affordable housing program.
Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $37,860 | 2 Occupants: $43,260 | 3
To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.
Call today to schedule your tour:
